list.Description: A Provincial Project that my from time to time request equipment under the HETS programme from a Service Area.
list.Name: Project

list.Description: A system-generated unique identifier for a Project
list.Name: id

list.Description: The Service Area associated with this Project record.
list.Name: serviceArea

list.Description: TO BE VERIFIED - The Provincial charge code for the equipment hiring related to this project. This will be the same across multiple service areas that provide equipment for the same Project.
list.Name: provincialProjectNumber

list.Description: A descriptive name for the Project, useful to the HETS Clerk and Project Manager.
list.Name: name

list.Description: Information about the Project needed by the HETS Clerks. Used for capturing varying (project by project) metadata needed to process requests related to the project.
list.Name: information

list.Description: Link to the designated Primary Contact for the Project - usually the Project Manager requesting to hire equipment.
list.Name: primaryContact

list.Description: A request from a Project for one or more of a type of equipment from a specific Local Area.
list.Name: Request

list.Description: A system-generated unique identifier for a Request
list.Name: id

list.Description: The number of pieces of the equipment type wanted for hire as part of this request.
list.Name: equipmentCount

list.Description: The expected number of rental hours for each piece equipment hired against this request, as provided by the Project Manager making the request.
list.Name: expectedHours

list.Description: The expected start date of each piece of equipment hired against this request, as provided by the Project Manager making the request.
list.Name: expectedStartDate

list.Description: The expected end date of each piece of equipment hired against this request, as provided by the Project Manager making the request.
list.Name: expectedEndDate

list.Description: The first piece of equipment on the rotation list at the time of the creation of the request.
list.Name: firstOnRotationList

list.Description: An eligible piece of equipment for a request and a tracking of the hire offer and response process related to a request for that piece of equipment. Includes a link from the equipment to a Rental Agreement if the equipment was hired to satisfy a part of the request.
list.Name: RequestRotationList

list.Description: A system-generated unique identifier for a RequestRotationList
list.Name: id

list.Description: The order of the piece of equipment on the rotaton list at the time the request was created.
list.Name: rotationListOrder

list.Description: The rental agreement (if any) created for an accepted hire offer.
list.Name: rentalAgreement

list.Description: True if the HETS Clerk designated the hire of this equipment as being a Forced Hire. A Force Hire implies that the usual seniority rules for hiring are bypassed because of special circumstances related to the hire - e.g. a the hire requires an attachment only one piece of equipment has.
list.Name: isForceHire

list.Description: True if the HETS Clerk contacted the equipment owner and asked to hire the piece of equipment.
list.Name: wasAsked

list.Description: The Date-Time the HETS clerk contacted the equipment owner and asked to hire the piece of equipment.
list.Name: askedDateTime

list.Description: The response to the offer to hire. Null prior to receiving a response; a string after with the response - likely just Yes or No
list.Name: offerResponse

list.Description: An optional reason given by the equipment owner for refusing the offer.
list.Name: refuseReason

list.Description: An optional general note about the offer.
list.Name: note

list.Description: Information about the hiring of a specific piece of equipment to satisfy part or all of a request from a project. TABLE DEFINITION IN PROGRESS - MORE COLUMNS TO BE ADDED
list.Name: RentalAgreement

list.Description: A system-generated unique identifier for a RentalAgreement
list.Name: id

list.Description: A record of time worked for a piece of equipment hired for a specific project within a Local Area.
list.Name: TimeRecord

list.Description: A system-generated unique identifier for a TimeRecord
list.Name: id

list.Description: The date of the time record entry - the day of the entry if it is a daily entry, or a date in the week in which the work occurred if tracked weekly.
list.Name: workedDate

list.Description: The date-time the time record information was entered.
list.Name: enteredDate

list.Description: The time period of the entry - either day or week. HETS Clerk have the option of entering time records on a day-by-day or week-by-week basis.
list.Name: timePeriod

list.Description: The number of hours worked by the equipment.
list.Name: hours

list.Description: TO BE REMOVED - REPLACE WITH A LINK TO A RATE ENTRY IN THE RENTAL AGREEMENT
list.Name: rate

list.Description: TO BE REMOVED - REPLACE WITH A LINK TO A RATE ENTRY IN THE RENTAL AGREEMENT
list.Name: hours2

list.Description: TO BE REMOVED - REPLACE WITH A LINK TO A RATE ENTRY IN THE RENTAL AGREEMENT
list.Name: rate2

list.Description: TO BE REMOVED - REPLACE WITH A LINK TO A RATE ENTRY IN THE RENTAL AGREEMENT
list.Name: hours3

list.Description: TO BE REMOVED - REPLACE WITH A LINK TO A RATE ENTRY IN THE RENTAL AGREEMENT
list.Name: rate3

list.Description: A piece of equipment in the HETS system. Each piece of equipment is of a specific equipment type, owned by an Owner, and is within a Local Area.
list.Name: Equipment

list.Description: A system-generated unique identifier for a Equipment
list.Name: id

list.Description: A human-visible unique code for the piece of equipment, referenced for convenience by the system users - HETS Clerks and Equipment Owners. Generated at record creation time based on the unique Owner prefix (e.g. EDW) and a zero-filled unique number - resulting in a code like EDW-0083.
list.Name: equipCode

list.Description: The current status of the equipment in a UI-controlled string. Initial values are Pending, Approved and Archived, but other values may be added.
list.Name: status

list.Description: The date the piece of equipment was first received and recorded in HETS.
list.Name: receivedDate

list.Description: The date the piece of equipment was first approved in HETS. Part of the seniority calculation for a piece of equipment is based on this date.
list.Name: approvedDate

list.Description: The date the equipment was last verified by the HETS Clerk as being still in service in the Local Area and available for the HETS Programme.
list.Name: lastVerifiedDate

list.Description: Set true if a need to update the information/status of the equipment is needed. Used during the processing of a request when an update is noted, but the Clerk does not have time to make the update.
list.Name: isInformationUpdateNeeded

list.Description: A note about why the needed information/status update that is needed about the equipment.
list.Name: informationUpdateNeededReason

list.Description: The licence plate (if any) of the piece of equipment, as entered by the HETS Clerk.
list.Name: licencePlate

list.Description: The make of the piece of equipment, as provided by the Equipment Owner.
list.Name: make

list.Description: The model of the piece of equipment, as provided by the Equipment Owner.
list.Name: model

list.Description: The model year of the piece of equipment, as provided by the Equipment Owner.
list.Name: year

list.Description: TO BE REVIEWED - WHAT IS THIS?
list.Name: type

list.Description: TO BE REVIEWED - IS THIS NEEDED?
list.Name: operator

list.Description: TO BE REVIEWED - IS THIS NEEDED?
list.Name: payRate

list.Description: TO BE REVIEWED - IS THIS NEEDED?
list.Name: refuseRate

list.Description: The serial number of the piece of equipment as provided by the Equipment Owner. Used to detect and reconcile pieces of equipment moved between Local Areas. Duplicate serial numbers are flagged in the system but permitted. The duplicates are flagged in the UI until the HETS Clerks reconcile the differences - either correcting the serial number or archiving a piece of equipment moved to a new local area.
list.Name: serialNum

list.Description: The size of the piece of equipment, as provided by the Equipment Owner.
list.Name: size

list.Description: WHAT IS THIS?
list.Name: toDate

list.Description: The current block number for the piece of equipment as calculated by the Seniority Algorthm for this equipment type in the local area. As currently defined y the business  - 1, 2 or Open
list.Name: blockNumber

list.Description: The current seniority calculation result for this piece of equipment. The calculation is based on the "numYears" of service + average hours of service over the last three fiscal years - as stored in the related fields (serviceHoursLastYear, serviceHoursTwoYearsAgo serviceHoursThreeYearsAgo).
list.Name: seniority

list.Description: The time the seniority data in the record went into effect. Used to populate the SeniorityAudit table when the seniority data is next updated.
list.Name: seniorityEffectiveDate

list.Description: The number of years of active service of this piece of equipment at the time seniority is calculated - April 1 of the current FY.
list.Name: yearsOfService

list.Description: Number of hours of service by this piece of equipment in the previous fiscal year
list.Name: serviceHoursLastYear

list.Description: Number of hours of service by this piece of equipment in the fiscal year before the last one - e.g. if current year is FY2018 then hours in FY2016
list.Name: serviceHoursTwoYearsAgo

list.Description: Number of hours of service by this piece of equipment in the fiscal year three years ago - e.g. if current year is FY2018 then hours in FY2015
list.Name: serviceHoursThreeYearsAgo

list.Description: A reason code indicating why a piece of equipment has been archived.
list.Name: archiveCode

list.Description: An optional comment about why this piece of equipment has been archived.
list.Name: archiveReason

list.Description: The date on which a user most recenly marked this piece of equipment as archived.
list.Name: archiveDate

list.Description: A link to a dump truck set if this piece of equipment is an equipment type flagged as a dump truck.
list.Name: dumpTruck

list.Description: Additional attributes about a piece of equipment designated as a Dump Truck. Historically, there was a perceived need to track a lot of informatiion about a dump truck, but in practice, few fields are being completed by users. Places for the attributes are being maintained, but the UI is prompting only for a couple of the fields, and only those fields are likely to be populated. Additional basic information about the attributes can be found on Wikipedia, BC-specific details on MOTI's CVSE website and www.bclaws.ca/EPLibraries/bclaws_new/document/ID/freeside/30_78#AppendicesAtoK, Appendix A and  B. Any metrics information provided here is from the Equipment Owner.
list.Name: DumpTruck

list.Description: A system-generated unique identifier for a DumpTruck
list.Name: id

list.Description: True if the vehicle has a single axle. Can be false or null.
list.Name: isSingleAxle

list.Description: True if the vehicle has a tandem axle. Can be false or null.
list.Name: isTandemAxle

list.Description: True if the Dump Truck is a tridem - a three axle dump truck. Can be false or null.
list.Name: isTridem

list.Description: True if the Dump Truck has a PUP trailer - a trailer with it's own hydraulic unloading system. Can be false or null.
list.Name: hasPUP

list.Description: True if the Dump Truck has a belly dump capability. Can be false or null.
list.Name: hasBellyDump

list.Description: True if the Dump Truck has a rock box. Can be false or null.
list.Name: hasRockBox

list.Description: True if the Dump Truck has a high lift gate vs. a traditional gate. Can be false or null.
list.Name: hasHiliftGate

list.Description: True if the Dump Truck is a Water Truck. Can be false or null.
list.Name: isWaterTruck

list.Description: True if the Dump Truck has a hitch for using sealcoat trailers. Can be false or null.
list.Name: hasSealcoatHitch

list.Description: The spacing of the rear axles, if applicable. Usually in metres.
list.Name: rearAxleSpacing

list.Description: The size of of the Front Tires of the Dump Truck.
list.Name: frontTireSize

list.Description: The Unit of Measure of the Front Tire Size.
list.Name: frontTireUOM

list.Description: The rated capacity of the Front Axle.
list.Name: frontAxleCapacity

list.Description: The rated capacity of the Rear Axle.
list.Name: rearAxleCapacity

list.Description: The legal load of the vehicle in kg.
list.Name: legalLoad

list.Description: The legal capacity of the dump truck.
list.Name: legalCapacity

list.Description: The legal Tare Weight (weight when unloaded) of the PUP trailer.
list.Name: legalPUPTareWeight

list.Description: The Gross Vehicle Weight for which the vehicle is licensed. GVW includes the vehicle's chassis, body, engine, engine fluids, fuel, accessories, driver, passengers and cargo but excluding that of any trailers.
list.Name: licencedGVW

list.Description: The Unit of Measure (UOM) of the licenced GVW.
list.Name: licencedGVWUOM

list.Description: The licenced Tare Weight (weight when unloaded) of the vehicle.
list.Name: licencedTareWeight

list.Description: The licenced Tare Weight (weight when unloaded) of the PUP trailer.
list.Name: licencedPUPTareWeight

list.Description: The licenced maximum load of the vehicle in kg.
list.Name: licencedLoad

list.Description: The licenced maximum capacity of the vehicle.
list.Name: licencedCapacity

list.Description: The length of the box, in metres. See - http-//www.bclaws.ca/EPLibraries/bclaws_new/document/ID/freeside/30_7, appendix B
list.Name: boxLength

list.Description: The width of the box, in metres. See - http-//www.bclaws.ca/EPLibraries/bclaws_new/document/ID/freeside/30_7, appendix B
list.Name: boxWidth

list.Description: The height of the box, in metres. See- http-//www.bclaws.ca/EPLibraries/bclaws_new/document/ID/freeside/30_7, appendix B
list.Name: boxHeight

list.Description: The capacity of the box.
list.Name: boxCapacity

list.Description: The length of the trailer box, in metres. See www.bclaws.ca/EPLibraries/bclaws_new/document/ID/freeside/30_7, appendix B
list.Name: trailerBoxLength

list.Description: The width of the trailer box, in metres. See www.bclaws.ca/EPLibraries/bclaws_new/document/ID/freeside/30_7, appendix B
list.Name: trailerBoxWidth

list.Description: The height of the trailer box, in metres. See www.bclaws.ca/EPLibraries/bclaws_new/document/ID/freeside/30_7, appendix B
list.Name: trailerBoxHeight

list.Description: The capacity of the trailer box.
list.Name: trailerBoxCapacity

list.Description: A global and local area list of types of equipment for which a request can be generated and for which owners can register their equipment. If the local area is NULL, the type is visible Province-wide. In the previous instance of this application, all equipment types were assigned to the local area and transitioning to a province-wide model is being attempted (and may not work for the end users). An attempt to achieve a "mostly province-wide" list is being made during the data conversion process - mapping local area equipment types to provincial or local area types as part of data conversion.
list.Name: EquipmentType

list.Description: A system-generated unique identifier for an EquipmentType
list.Name: id

list.Description: CHECK WITH BUSINESS - IS THIS NEEDED - A unique but human-friendly code for the Equipment Type that can be displayed on screens with little screen real estate available.
list.Name: code

list.Description: The name of the equipment type, as specified by the HETS Clerk creating the equipment type.
list.Name: description

list.Description: CHECK WITH BUSINESS - IS THIS NEEDED
list.Name: equipRentalRateNo

list.Description: CHECK WITH BUSINESS - IS THIS NEEDED
list.Name: equipRentalRatePage

list.Description: CHECK WITH BUSINESS - IS THIS NEEDED
list.Name: maxHours

list.Description: CHECK WITH BUSINESS - IS THIS NEEDED
list.Name: extendHours

list.Description: CHECK WITH BUSINESS - IS THIS NEEDED
list.Name: maxHoursSub

list.Description: The number of blocks defined for this equipment type. Currently, either 2 for Dump Truck equipment and 1 for non-Dump Truck equipment. Unlikely to change, particularly without a significant impact on code.
list.Name: blocks

list.Description: An Equipment Attachment associated with a piece of Equipment.
list.Name: EquipmentAttachment

list.Description: A system-generated unique identifier for an EquipmentAttachment
list.Name: id

list.Description: TO BE REMOVED - likely not needed. Will talk to business.
list.Name: seqNum

list.Description: A description of the equipment attachment if the Equipment Attachment Type is insufficient.
list.Name: description

list.Description: An Equipment Attachment Type.
list.Name: EquipmentAttachmentType

list.Description: A system-generated unique identifier for a EquipmentAttachmentType
list.Name: id

list.Description: CHECK WITH BUSINESS - IS THIS NEEDED - A unique but human-friendly code for the Equipment Attachment Type that can be displayed on screens with little screen real estate available.
list.Name: code

list.Description: The name of the equipment attachment type, as specified by the HETS Clerk creating the equipment type.
list.Name: description

list.Description: The history of all changes to the seniority of a piece of equipment. The current seniority information (underlying data elements and the calculation result) is in the equipment record. Every time that information changes, the old values are copied to here, with a start date, end date range. In the normal case, an annual update triggers the old values being copied here and the new values put into the equipment record. If a user manually changes the values, the existing values are copied into a record added here.
list.Name: SeniorityAudit

list.Description: A system-generated unique identifier for a SeniorityAudit
list.Name: id

list.Description: The effective date that the Seniority data in this record went into effect.
list.Name: startDate

list.Description: The effective date at which the Seniority data in this record ceased to be in effect.
list.Name: endDate

list.Description: The block number for the piece of equipment as calculated by the Seniority Algorthm for this equipment type in the local area. As currently defined by the business - 1, 2 or Open
list.Name: blockNumber

list.Description: The name of the organization of the owner from the Owner Record, captured at the time this record was created.
list.Name: ownerOrganizationName

list.Description: The seniority calculation result for this piece of equipment. The calculation is based on the "numYears" of service + average hours of service over the last three fiscal years - as stored in the related fields (serviceHoursLastYear, serviceHoursTwoYearsAgo serviceHoursThreeYearsAgo).
list.Name: seniority

list.Description: Sum of hours in the current fiscal year's time cards captured at the time this record was created.
list.Name: serviceHoursCurrentYearToDate

list.Description: Number of hours of service by this piece of equipment in the previous fiscal year
list.Name: serviceHoursLastYear

list.Description: Number of hours of service by this piece of equipment in the fiscal year before the last one - e.g. if current year is FY2018 then hours in FY2016
list.Name: serviceHoursTwoYearsAgo

list.Description: Number of hours of service by this piece of equipment in the fiscal year three years ago - e.g. if current year is FY2018 then hours in FY2015
list.Name: serviceHoursThreeYearsAgo

list.Description: The person or company to which a piece of construction equipment belongs.
list.Name: Owner

list.Description: A system-generated unique identifier for a Owner
list.Name: id

list.Description: A unique prefix in the system that is used to generate the human-friendly IDs of the equipment. E.g. An owner Edwards might have a prefix "EDW" and their equipment numbered sequentially with that prefix - e.g. EDW-0082.
list.Name: ownerCodePrefix

list.Description: The name of the organization of the Owner. May simply be the First Name, Last Name of the Owner if the Owner is a sole proprietorship, or the name of a company.
list.Name: organizationName

list.Description: Link to the designated Primary Contact.
list.Name: primaryContact

list.Description: True if the owner is contracted by MOTI to handle Maintenance activities in the area - e.g. provided services in address unscheduled issues on the roads in the area.
list.Name: isMaintenanceContractor

list.Description: TO BE REMOVED - replaced with Notes
list.Name: comment

list.Description: TO BE REMOVED - not maintained by HETS Clerks
list.Name: WCBNum

list.Description: The expiration of the owner's current WCB permit.
list.Name: WCBExpiryDate

list.Description: TO BE REMOVED - not maintained by HETS Clerks
list.Name: CGLCompany

list.Description: TO BE REMOVED - not maintained by HETS Clerks
list.Name: CGLPolicy

list.Description: TO BE REMOVED - not maintained by HETS Clerks
list.Name: CGLStartDate

list.Description: The end date of the owner's Commercial General Liability insurance coverage. Coverage is only needed prior to an owner's piece of equipment starting a rental period (not when in the HETS program but not hired). The details of the coverage can be entered into a Note, or more often - attached as a scanned/faxed document.
list.Name: CGLEndDate

list.Description: The status of the owner record in the system. Current set of values are "Pending", "Approved" and "Archived". Pending is used when an owner self-registers and a HETS Clerk has not reviewed and Approved the record. Archived is when the owner is no longer part of the HETS programme. "Approved" is used in all other cases.
list.Name: status

list.Description: A coded reason for why an owner record has been moved to Archived.
list.Name: archiveCode

list.Description: A text note about why the owner record has been changed to Archived.
list.Name: archiveReason

list.Description: A person and their related contact information linked to one or more entities in the system. For examples, there are contacts for Owners, Projects.
list.Name: Contact

list.Description: A system-generated unique identifier for a Contact
list.Name: id

list.Description: The given name of the contact.
list.Name: givenName

list.Description: The surname of the contact.
list.Name: surname

list.Description: The role of the contact. UI controlled as to whether it is free form or selected from an enumerated list - for initial implementation, the field is freeform.
list.Name: role

list.Description: A note about the contact maintained by the users.
list.Name: notes

list.Description: Phone number information related to a contact.
list.Name: ContactPhone

list.Description: A system-generated unique identifier for a ContactPhone
list.Name: id

list.Description: The type of the phone number. UI controlled as to whether it is free form or selected from an enumerated list.  Ex. Home, Cell, Work etc..
list.Name: type

list.Description: The phone number of the contact. Entered as free form to support a range of formats.
list.Name: phoneNumber

list.Description: Address information related to a contact.
list.Name: ContactAddress

list.Description: A system-generated unique identifier for a ContactAddress
list.Name: id

list.Description: The type of the address. UI controlled as to whether it is free form or selected from an enumerated list ex. Home, Office, etc..
list.Name: type

list.Description: Address 1 line of the address.
list.Name: addressLine1

list.Description: Address 2 line of the address.
list.Name: addressLine2

list.Description: The City of the address.
list.Name: city

list.Description: The Province of the address.
list.Name: province

list.Description: The postal code of the address.
list.Name: postalCode

list.Description: Text entered about an entity in the application - e.g. piece of Equipment, an Owner, a Project and so on.
list.Name: Note

list.Description: A system-generated unique identifier for a Note
list.Name: id

list.Description: Notes entered by users about instance of entities - e.g. School Buses and School Bus Owners
list.Name: text

list.Description: A user set flag that the note is no longer relevant. Allows the note to be retained for historical reasons,  but identified to other users as no longer applicable.
list.Name: isNoLongerRelevant

list.Description: Uploaded documents related to entity in the application - e.g. piece of Equipment, an Owner, a Project and so on.
list.Name: Attachment

list.Description: A system-generated unique identifier for an Attachment
list.Name: id

list.Description: The physical location of the attachment on the file system.
list.Name: internalFileName

list.Description: The name of the attachment as defined by the user in uploading the document.
list.Name: externalFileName

list.Description: A note about the attachment,  optionally maintained by the user.
list.Name: description

list.Description: A log entry created by the system based on a triggering event and related to an entity in the application - e.g. piece of Equipment, an Owner, a Project and so on.
list.Name: History

list.Description: A system-generated unique identifier for a History
list.Name: id

list.Description: The text of the history entry tracked against the related entity.
list.Name: historyText

list.Description: Date the record is created.
list.Name: createdDate

list.Description: The name for a place in the UI where per user settings can be stored - for example, the Equipment search screen, Owner search screen, etc.
list.Name: FavouriteContextType

list.Description: A system-generated unique identifier for a FavouriteContextType
list.Name: id

list.Description: Context Name known by the UI.
list.Name: name

list.Description: User specific settings for a specific location in the UI. The location and saved settings are internally defined by the UI.
list.Name: UserFavourite

list.Description: A system-generated unique identifier for a UserFavourite
list.Name: id

list.Description: The user-defined name for the recorded settings. Allows the user to save different groups of settings and access each one easily when needed.
list.Name: name

list.Description: The settings saved by the user. In general,  a UI defined chunk of json that stores the settings in place when the user created the favourite.
list.Name: value

list.Description: True if this Favourite is the default for this Context Type. On first access to a context in a session the default favourite for the context it is invoked. If there is no default favourite,  a system-wide default is invoked. On return to the context within a session,  the last parameters used are reapplied.
list.Name: isDefault

list.Description: The type of Favourite
list.Name: type

list.Description: The User who has this Favourite
list.Name: User

list.Description: The Ministry of Transportion and Infrastructure REGION.
list.Name: Region

list.Description: A system-generated unique identifier for a Region
list.Name: id

list.Description: A system generated unique identifier. NOT GENERATED IN THIS SYSTEM.
list.Name: ministryRegionID

list.Description: A code that uniquely defines a Region.
list.Name: regionNumber

list.Description: The name of a Minsitry Region.
list.Name: name

list.Description: The DATE the business information came into effect. - NOT CURRENTLY ENFORCED IN THIS SYSTEM
list.Name: startDate

list.Description: The DATE the business information ceased to be in effect. - NOT CURRENTLY ENFORCED IN THIS SYSTEM
list.Name: endDate

list.Description: The Ministry of Transportion and Infrastructure DISTRICT
list.Name: District

list.Description: A system-generated unique identifier for a District
list.Name: id

list.Description: A system generated unique identifier. NOT GENERATED IN THIS SYSTEM.
list.Name: ministryDistrictID

list.Description: The Name of a Ministry District.
list.Name: name

list.Description: A number that uniquely defines a Ministry District.
list.Name: districtNumber

list.Description: The region in which the District is found.
list.Name: region

list.Description: The DATE the business information came into effect. - NOT CURRENTLY ENFORCED IN THIS SYSTEM
list.Name: startDate

list.Description: The DATE the business information ceased to be in effect. - NOT CURRENTLY ENFORCED IN THIS SYSTEM
list.Name: endDate

list.Description: The Ministry of Transportation and Infrastructure SERVICE AREA.
list.Name: ServiceArea

list.Description: A system-generated unique identifier for a ServiceArea
list.Name: id

list.Description: A system generated unique identifier. NOT GENERATED IN THIS SYSTEM.
list.Name: ministryServiceAreaID

list.Description: A number that uniquely defines a Ministry Service Area.
list.Name: areaNumber

list.Description: The Name of a Ministry Service Area.
list.Name: name

list.Description: The district in which the Service Area is found.
list.Name: district

list.Description: The DATE the business information came into effect. - NOT CURRENTLY ENFORCED IN THIS SYSTEM
list.Name: startDate

list.Description: The DATE the business information ceased to be in effect. - NOT CURRENTLY ENFORCED IN THIS SYSTEM
list.Name: endDate

list.Description: A HETS-application defined area that is within a Service Area.
list.Name: LocalArea

list.Description: A system-generated unique identifier for a LocalArea
list.Name: id

list.Description: A system-generated, visible to the user number for the Local Area
list.Name: localAreaNumber

list.Description: The full name of the Local Area
list.Name: name

list.Description: The Service Area in which the Local Area is found.
list.Name: serviceArea

list.Description: The DATE the business information came into effect. - NOT CURRENTLY ENFORCED IN THIS SYSTEM
list.Name: startDate

list.Description: The DATE the business information ceased to be in effect. - NOT CURRENTLY ENFORCED IN THIS SYSTEM
list.Name: endDate

list.Description: A list of cities in BC. Authoritative source to be determined.
list.Name: City

list.Description: A system-generated unique identifier for a City
list.Name: id

list.Description: The name of the City
list.Name: name

list.Description: An identified user in the HETS Application that has a defined authorization level.
list.Name: User

list.Description: A system-generated unique identifier for a User
list.Name: id

list.Description: Given name of the user.
list.Name: givenName

list.Description: Surname of the user.
list.Name: surname

list.Description: Initials of the user, to be presented where screen space is at a premium.
list.Name: initials

list.Description: The email address of the user in the system.
list.Name: email

list.Description: A flag indicating the User is active in the system. Set false to remove access to the system for the user.
list.Name: active

list.Description: Security Manager User ID
list.Name: smUserId

list.Description: The GUID unique to the user as provided by the authentication system. In this case, authentication is done by Siteminder and the GUID uniquely identifies the user within the user directories managed by Siteminder - e.g. IDIR and BCeID. The GUID is equivalent to the IDIR Id, but is guaranteed unique to a person, while the IDIR ID is not - IDIR IDs can be recycled.
list.Name: guid

list.Description: The user directory service used by Siteminder to authenticate the user - usually IDIR or BCeID.
list.Name: smAuthorizationDirectory

list.Description: A join table that provides allows each user to have any number of Roles in the system.  At login time the user is given the sum of the permissions of the roles assigned to that user.
list.Name: UserRole

list.Description: A system-generated unique identifier for a UserRole
list.Name: id

list.Description: The date on which the user was given the related role.
list.Name: effectiveDate

list.Description: The date on which a role previously assigned to a user was removed from that user.
list.Name: expiryDate

list.Description: A HETS application-managed Role that has a selected list of permissions and can be assigned to Users. A role coresponds to the authorization level provided a user based on the work for which they are responsible.
list.Name: Role

list.Description: A system-generated unique identifier for a Role
list.Name: id

list.Description: The name of the Role, as established by the user creating the role.
list.Name: name

list.Description: A description of the role as set by the user creating/updating the role.
list.Name: description

list.Description: A permission that is part of a Role - a component of the authorization provided by the Role to the user to which the Role is assigned.
list.Name: RolePermission

list.Description: A system-generated unique identifier for a RolePermission
list.Name: id

list.Description: A named element of authorization defined in the code that triggers some behavior in the application. For example, a permission might allow users to see data or to have access to functionality not accessible to users without that permission. Permissions are created as needed to the application code and are added to the permissions table by data migrations executed at the time the software that uses the permission is deployed.
list.Name: Permission

list.Description: A system-generated unique identifier for a Permission
list.Name: id

list.Description: The name of the permission referenced in the software of the application.
list.Name: code

list.Description: The 'user friendly' name of the permission exposed to the user selecting the permissions to be included in a Role.
list.Name: name

list.Description: A description of the purpose of the permission and exposed to the user selecting the permissions to be included in a Role.
list.Name: description

list.Description: The users associated with a given group that has been defined in the application.
list.Name: GroupMembership

list.Description: A system-generated unique identifier for a GroupMembership
list.Name: id

list.Description: A flag indicating the User is active in the group. Set false to remove the user from the designated group.
list.Name: active

list.Description: A named entity that is used to create a arbitrary collection of users into a group. For example, the HETS Clerks are in the group Clerks. Groups, like permissions are defined by and referenced in code.
list.Name: Group

list.Description: A system-generated unique identifier for a Group
list.Name: id

list.Description: The name of the group, as refenced in the code.
list.Name: name

list.Description: A description of the group that is presented to the user when they are setting a user into a group.
list.Name: description
